statements: ALTER TABLE CloudComputingData ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE CloudComputingData DROP COLUMN location
ALTER TABLE CloudComputingData MODIFY COLUMN company_name VARCHAR(100)
ALTER TABLE cloud_providers ADD COLUMN established_year INT
ALTER TABLE cloud_services ADD COLUMN service_category VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE cloud_services ADD CONSTRAINT fk_provider FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES cloud_providers(provider_id)
ALTER TABLE cloud_providers ADD COLUMN provider_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE cloud_providers ADD COLUMN pricing_model VARCHAR(255)
ALTER TABLE cloud_providers MODIFY COLUMN location VARCHAR(100)
ALTER TABLE instance ADD COLUMN launch_date DATE;
ALTER TABLE storage ADD COLUMN capacity INTEGER;
ALTER TABLE billing ADD COLUMN currency VARCHAR(3);
